{{cpp/regex/match_results/title|length}}
{{cpp/regex/match_results/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=c++11|1=
difference_type length( size_type n = 0 ) const;
}}

Returns the length of the specified sub-match.

If {{c|1=n == 0}}, the length of the entire matched expression is returned.

If {{c|n &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; n &lt; size()}}, the length of {{c|n}}{{sup|th}} sub-match is returned.

if {{c|1=n &gt;= size()}}, a length of the unmatched match is returned.

The call is equivalent to {{c|(*this)[n].length()}}.

{{cpp/precondition|{{rlpf|ready}} must be {{c|true}}.}}

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|n|integral number specifying which match to examine}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
The length of the specified match or sub-match.
